body: As the kingdom grows, the party gains experience points the first time it reaches each of the following milestones.
name: Gaining Experience for Leadership
url: pfsrd://Ultimate Campaign/Rules/Kingdoms And War/Kingdom Building/Gaining Experience for Leadership

sections.body: 2,400 XPEstablish a Capital City: 1,200 XPReach a Kingdom Size of 11: 2,400 XPReach a Kingdom Size of 26: 4,800 XPReach a Kingdom Size of 51: 9,600 XPReach a Kingdom Size of 101: 12,800 XPReach a Kingdom Size of 151: 25,600 XPReach a Kingdom Size of 201: 76,800 XPFill a Settlement with 4 Lots of Buildings: 1,600 XPFill a Settlement with 16 Lots of Buildings: 4,800 XPFill a Settlement with 36 Lots of Buildings: 12,800 XP
sections.name: Found a Kingdom
sections.url: pfsrd://Ultimate Campaign/Rules/Kingdoms And War/Kingdom Building/Gaining Experience for Leadership/Found a Kingdom
